title: 08/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Dak Prescott getting another MRI on his throwing shoulder is reason for concern as we get closer to the start of the NFL regular season. He discovers what Tom Brady's real inspiration is to continue playing in the NFL after winning 7 Super Bowls. He is also making a surprising comparison between 2 NFL QBs, one that was drafted number 1 overall and another that was drafted in the 6th round, and how similar their careers have been. Plus, Ole Miss head coach Lane Kiffin joins the show to talk about his former quarterbacks Jalen Hurts and Mac Jones transitioning to the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
